content.webTitle: Film references: the picture on the beach

fields.headline: Film references: the picture on the beach
fields.bodyText: 1. Broken Bike Lock - The Bicycle Thief 2. A Grand Piano On The Beach - The Piano 3. Hot Air Bags With Names On - The Beach 4. Helicopters - Apocalypse Now 5. Scuba Divers - Open Water 6. Shark Fin - Jaws 7. Ursula Andress - Dr No 8. Broken Deck Chairs - Quadrophenia 9. Red Table And Chair On The Beach - Shirley Valentine 10. Woman In A Black At The End Of The Breakwater- The French Lieutenant's Woman 11. Fat Sunbather Wearing Yellow Trunks - Sexy Beast 12. Runners In Old-Fashioned Sports Kit - Chariots Of Fire 13. 'White Star' Piece Of Broken Wood Washed Up- Titanic 14. 'Missing' Pictures On The Information Sign- The Lost Boys 15. Kestrel On Railings - Kes 16. Beach Defenses - Saving Private Ryan 17. Broken Pier End - Godzilla 18. Comet - Deep Impact 19. Bhaji In The Sand - Bhaji On The Beach 20. Submarine - The Hunt For Red October
